name: Monument Reverb Air Envelope — HF Damping Modulation
description: Parameter automation test: Envelope on air parameter (index 5). Sweeps air through attack-sustain-release shape, modulating high-frequency content. Validates spectral centroid responds to HF damping changes.

capability_requirements.notes: Parameter automation — envelope on air (HF damping)

no_nan_inf.description: Output must be finite during air envelope

reasonable_peak.description: Peak level bounded during air envelope

rms_energy_check.description: RMS energy — measured -31.28 dBFS (±20 dB tolerance)

spectral_centroid_check.description: Spectral centroid — measured 6359 Hz during air envelope (±50%)

pass_criteria: Air envelope modulation produces spectral variation without instability
